des: "This herb bread is almost exactly like the bread they serve at Macaroni GrillÂ®. This bread is best warm or toasted. We serve it with soups or even just toasted for breakfast spread with cream cheese instead of butter."
ins:
Pour warm water into the pan of your bread machine; add egg, salt, white sugar, olive oil, rosemary, oregano, basil, flour, and bread machine yeast, respectively.
Set machine to bake a large loaf with light crust and press Start.
